entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
